file=$(python3 -c "import json,os; d=json.loads(os.environ.get('CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT','{}')); print(d.get('file_path',''))" 2>/dev/null); [[ "$file" == *.ts || "$file" == *.tsx ]] && cd /Users/jb/clarity && npx tsc --noEmit --pretty 2>&1 | tail -20 || true
